means: 阿尔萨斯（法国东北部一地名）

sentence.Network_en: France ceded Alsace - Lorraine to Germany in 1871.
sentence.Network_cn: 1871年法国把阿尔萨斯 ― 洛林地区割让给了德国.

sentence.Network_en: Peace was signed at Frankfort surrendering the provinces of Alsace and Lorraine to the Germans.
sentence.Network_cn: 和平协议在法兰克福签署,阿尔萨斯和洛林.拱手让给德国.

sentence.Network_en: The unforgivable, reality , however, was the loss of the border provinces, Alsace and Lorrain.
sentence.Network_cn: 然而, 令人难以容忍的现实是, 丧失了阿尔萨斯和洛林这两个边界省分.

list.abs: alsace produces excellent dry and sweet white wines ., 出产最好的干白和白葡萄酒.
dimensional stability of alsace knitted fabrics ., 粗细针距针织物尺寸的稳定性.
